text:
"Which [Fortnite] action figures do you have?"

"I have Ragnarok, Drift, Jonesy Chapter 1..."

"I have no idea what Dominic’s talking about."

@FortniteGame changed the gaming world. How did it happen? A new episode of Thrilling Tales Of Modern Capitalism: https://t.co/jFTfmckfqe https://t.co/5j4jA1NzqI
